meanings.sent1: In the aquarium, the octopuses swam gracefully in their tank.
meanings.sent2: The octopuses in the ocean moved swiftly through the water.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they watched the octopuses play hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, with its many braids, resembled the tentacles of octopuses.
meanings.sent5: The octopuses changed color to blend in with their surroundings, like magical creatures.

meanings.definition: Octopuses: a sea animal with eight arms and a soft body
meanings.sent1: The octopuses used their arms to catch their prey in the deep sea.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of octopuses hiding among the rocks near the shore.
meanings.sent3: The chef prepared a delicious dish using octopuses as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent4: Her dance was as fluid and graceful as the movements of octopuses underwater.
meanings.sent5: The octopuses squeezed through a tiny opening in the coral reef, showing their flexibility.
